ComicInfo.Summary:
Evils align! In an ancient runelord stronghold the Pathfinder heroes find themselves confronted by a familiar foe and his team of notorious scoundrels. Worse, these villains are pursuing the same relic they’ve come to find! But greedy treasure hunters aren’t the only threat as a deathless evil stirs deep within Hollow Mountain. They delve into one of Pathfinder’s most notorious dungeons grows deadlier in this chapter, written by Pathfinder Editor-in-Chief F. Wesley Schneider, and with art from rising star Tom Garcia! Contains pull-out poster map and official Pathfinder RPG bonus encounter!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A/Reg | Regular Cover | James Boyle | 1 | B/Var | Variant Cover | Carlos Gomez & Kim Mohan | 2 | C/Sub | Subscription Cover | Tom Garcia & Kim Mohan | 3 | D/LE | Ultra-Limited Edition Variant Cover | Sean Izaakse & Kim Mohan | 4 | E/RE | Paizo.com Exclusive Variant Cover | Sebastian Cichon | 5 |
